Title: Requires the mandatory reporting of suspected child abuse or maltreatment by certain employees of the metropolitan transportation authority
Summary: Requires the mandatory reporting of suspected child abuse or maltreatment by certain employees of the metropolitan transportation authority; requires such employees to complete coursework or training regarding the identification and reporting of child abuse and maltreatment.
LawCode: Amd ยง413, Soc Serv L; add ยง1266-n, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the mandatory reporting of suspected child abuse or maltreatment by certain employees of the metropolitan transportation authority
